sentences.en: A citizen of London is called a Londoner.
sentences.cn: 伦敦的市民被叫做伦敦人.

sentences.en: Bow Church is dear to the heart of every Londoner.
sentences.cn: 圣玛利教堂是每一位伦敦市民心爱的地方.

sentences.en: Her accent betrays her a Londoner.
sentences.cn: 她的口音说明她是伦敦人.

sentences.en: John a Londoner; that is, he lives in London.
sentences.cn: 约翰是伦敦人, 也就是他生活在伦敦.

sentences.en: Mr Evans is a Londoner born and bred.
sentences.cn: 埃文斯先生是个道地的伦敦人.

sentences.en: Scottish person has to listen carefully if he wants to understand a Londoner.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰人若想知道伦敦人在说什么的话,他就必须仔细地听.

sentences.en: She's a Londoner of mixed parentage (English and Jamaican).
sentences.cn: 她是个混血（英国和牙买加）伦敦人。

sentences.en: So the Londoner stood up to leave and fell flat on his face.
sentences.cn: 于是伦敦人起身离开,却直挺挺地摔倒在地上.

sentences.en: Thackery was an Englishman of Englishmen a Londoner of Londoners.
sentences.cn: 萨克雷是典型的英国人,而且是典型的伦敦人.

sentences.en: The Londoner lives neighbo ( u ) rless.
sentences.cn: 那个伦敦人孤独地生活着.

sentences.en: The other players in final three were east Londoner Dee Okojie and Mark Gradosielski from Essex.
sentences.cn: 最后三名决赛选手的其他人是东伦敦人迪?克杰和来自埃塞克斯的马克?拉德西尔斯基.
